items.question: What kind of videos can be summarized?
items.answer: Our tool works best with various types of videos including training sessions, promotional content, interviews, and presentations. Simple to complex videos can be distilled into engaging summaries that showcase key points effectively.

items.question: Can I customize the summary layout?
items.answer: Yes! You can choose from multiple summary styles to match your branding and desired format. Customize the focus and presentation to ensure it aligns with your message.

items.question: How long does summarization take?
items.answer: Typically, the summarization process takes only 1-2 minutes regardless of video length. Enjoy rapid results that keep pace with your efficiency needs.

items.question: Are there limitations on video length for summarization?
items.answer: Our tool can handle videos of various lengths. However, for optimal results, we recommend adhering to typical industry standards for video lengths when submitting content.

items.question: Can I edit the summary after generation?
items.answer: Absolutely! While our AI delivers a polished summary, you have the flexibility to tweak and adjust it further using your preferred editing tools for maximum impact.

items.question: What is the pricing structure for using the summarization tool?
items.answer: WaveSpeed operates on a pay-as-you-go model. You only pay for the summaries generated, allowing for budget control and flexibility with no hidden costs.

items.question: Do I retain rights to the generated summaries?
items.answer: Yes! All summaries created with our AI tool come with full commercial rights, allowing unrestricted use without additional licensing fees.

items.question: Is there customer support available?
items.answer: Yes! We offer comprehensive support, including detailed FAQs, documentation, and a responsive customer service team to assist with inquiries and troubleshooting needs.

items.question: What formats can I upload for summarization?
items.answer: We support a variety of video formats including MP4, MOV, and AVI. Ensure your content is clear and of high quality for the best summarization results.

items.question: Can I generate multiple summaries at once?
items.answer: Yes! Our tool supports batch processing, allowing you to generate summaries for multiple videos simultaneously, making it efficient and hassle-free.
